location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire to John Wedderburn, Civil Auditor, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter forwarding a corrected abstract of expenditure during Stannus absence on duty from the Residency November and December 1825, and March and April 1826; along with additional expenses incurred between 30 October and 11 November 1825 whilst on official duty at Katiffe [Al Qaţīf] in Bahrein.The letter concludes by stating that James Pringle Riach's absence from the Residency has resulted in some statements and accounts not being formally signed and that these will be forwarded as soon as possible once he had returned.
